title: ISO 20022-Compliant Tokens: XRP, Cardano, Algorand, Stellar, and IOTA Shape the Future of Tokenization
description: The financial world is headed toward a shared ledger and universal messaging protocol, and according to SWIFT, this can only be achieved through ISO 20022-compliant solutions. In the crypto world, ISO 20022 compliance is spearheaded by XRP, Stellar, IOTA, Hedera, Algorand, and Cardano, which could all play a significant role in the new financial order. [...]
